title: Klearsky
resetTextarea: Reset text area. Are you sure?
confirmUrlNotification: Open the following URL. Are you sure?
label: Label
labelerOverLimit: Cannot register this labeler because the subscribed labeler has reached the upper limit.
labelerResetMessage: Reset all settings. Are you sure?
leaveChatConvoConfirmation: You will leave the chat. You can re-enter, but you will not be able to retrieve your current messages. Are you sure?
errorInvalidChatToken:
Failed to start chat.
Please grant chat privileges to App passwords if you are using that.
chatUrlNotification: The URL format is not a post AT URI.
noMyWord: No my words. Please add it.
deleteMyWordMessage: This my word will be deleted. Are you sure?
successMessage: The process has been successfully completed.
errorNotification:
Please reload your browser before retrying.
If the error occurs again, please contact me with the details of the error.
errorDirectAccessFailed: Direct request to XRPC API failed.
contentFilteringDescription: After setting the controls for each content label, press the "Apply" button.
postDetachedBySelf: This post was detached by you.
reportSendConfirmationMessage: This report will be sent. Are you sure?
reportReasonViolation: Violation: Copyright violation, Violation of terms of Service
authFactorTokenMessage: A confirmation code for 2FA has been sent to you. Please enter it in the box above and login again.
loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your entry.
warpPostNotification: This post will be sent as the following date:
donwloadPostedImagesOnConfirmation:
Download images posted by this user.

* This feature is implemented on a trial basis.
* The images will be compiled into a .zip file.

* Download up to 100 images out of the last 1000 posts.
* Reposts are not included.
* Download images of the lowest quality.
* It may take several minutes to complete.
donwloadPostedImagesOnCancel: There were no images posted by this user.
donwloadPostedImagesOnComplete: Downloaded images posted by this user.
deletePostMessage: This post will be deleted. Are you sure?
createRepostConfirmation: Repost this post. Are you sure?
deleteRepostConfirmation: Cancel the repost of this post. Are you sure?
noStarterPacks: There are no starter packs managed by this user.
starterPackDeleteMessage:
Remove this starter pack. Are you sure?
The list referenced by this starter pack will not be deleted.
followingsDescription: Show posts of users you follow.
globallineDescription: Show all posts in real time.
globallineFollowersCountThreshold: Filtering posts by number of followers
globallineFollowersCountThresholdDescrip: A positive number matches N or more, a negative number matches N or less, and 0 matches 0.
contentLanguagesDetail2: Posts that don't match the selected languages will be collapsed.
contentLanguagesDetail3: If the appropriate languages is not set for the post, the above does not apply.
contentLanguagesDetail4: If none are selected, all posts will be displayed.
postLanguagesDetail1: Select up to 3 languages used in your post.
postLanguagesDetail2: This setting will be checked against the viewer's content languages.
autoTranslationRemarks1: The automatic translation uses the API of MyMemory, a translation memory operated by Translated.
autoTranslationRemarks2: Your email address will be assigned to the automatic translation API calls. Therefore, your email address may be shared with Translated and Translated's external partners.
autoTranslationRemarks3: There is a daily character limit for the automatic translation API calls.
autoTranslationRemarks4: For more information, check MyMemory website.
backgroundImage1: Depending on the server where the background image is placed, it may not be displayed.
backgroundImage2:
You can also set the value of the CSS property `background-image`.
e.g. linear-gradient(to bottom, pink, cyan)
wordMuteRemoveConfirmationMessage: Delete the following muted word. Are you sure?
replyFolding1: Fold replies to the users themselves
replyFolding3: Fold replies to users who don't follow you
replyFolding4: Fold replies to users you don't follow
replyFolding5: Fold replies to users you follow
repostFolding1: Fold reposts of posts by the users themselves
repostFolding2: Fold reposts of posts by you
repostFolding3: Fold reposts of posts by users who don't follow you
repostFolding4: Fold reposts of posts by users you don't follow
repostFolding5: Fold reposts of posts by users you follow
lightningDescription: Once you set up the LN-URL or Lightning Address as the payment destination for Lightning payments, a payment link (a.k.a. Zap button) will be given to your posts.
resetSettingsDetail: Reset this account's settings. Are you sure?
removeAccountHistoryMessage: This account will be deleted from My Accounts. Are you sure?
accountImportNotification:
Imports account data. 

* Overwrites existing data with input data. No deletion. 
* Currently logged in data will not be overwritten.

Do you want to continue?
urlHasImage: Attach OGP image to link card
sendPostNotification2: You can make Zap link with @zap (lightning setting required).
sendPostNotification3: The URL of link card can be set to the URL of a web page, AT URI of a post, AT URI of a feed, or AT URI of a list.
sendPostNotification4: Animated images are supported in .gif / .apng / .webp (not officially supported).
sendPostNotification5: It is possible to send more than the maximum number of characters.
sendPostResetMessage: Reset all entries. Are you sure?
postDatePopupDescription:
This post will be sent as the following date.
Valid only from 10 A.D. to the present date and time.
postDatePopupResetDescription: Reset the date. Are you sure?
emptyPostConfirmationMessage: This post seems to be empty. Do you want to post this as is?
noInviteCodes: No invite codes. Please note that if you are logged in with App passwords, you can not get an invite codes.
noMyAccounts: No My Accounts. Please log in first. You can create an account on the official client.
noMyFeeds: No My Feeds. Please save feeds.
noAuthorFeeds: There are no feeds managed by this user.
noFollowings: There are no users followed by this user.
noFollowers: There are no users following this user.
noList: There are no lists managed by this user.
listDeleteMessage: This list will be deleted. Are you sure?
myListConfirmation:
Refresh My List.
This may be a time-consuming process depending on the number of lists, is this OK?
threadgateNotification1: You can select up to 5 targets to allow reply.
threadgateNotification2: If apply without checking anything, only you will be able to reply.
customBookmarkOutputConfirmation: Copy the loaded posts to your clipboard as SkyFeed JSON.
listMentionNotification: Sends notifications to users in the selected list(up to 30 users). Mentions are not displayed in your post, and ostensibly the users to be notified are not known.
sortMyFeedsConfirmation:
My Feeds will be sorted.
You cannot redo this operation. Are you sure?
mergeV1ToV2: Merge v1 feeds into v2 feeds
mergeV1ToV2Confirmation:
Add v1 format custom feeds to v2 format custom feeds.

* This is for users who have been using Klearsky since v0.9.85 or earlier.
* This operation will resume synchronization with the official client.
* Please perform this operation only once.
mergeV1ToV2Canceled:
An error occurred while merging feeds.
A custom feeds in v1 format may not exist. In that case, merging is not necessary. Please ignore this error.
myFeedsFetchItemsError:
An error occurred while retrieving My Feeds.
Klearsky may have failed to retrieve some feed generator or list. If there is a problem with the content of My Feeds, please reload your browser without closing My Feeds popup.
apiError: An error occurred while connecting to the API.
cidEncodeError: An error occurred while encoding the CID.
downloadImageError: An error occurred while downloading images.
fetchOgpError: An error occurred while retrieving OGP. The URL may be incorrect or Bluesky's link server may be down.
fetchOgpImageError: An error occurred while retrieving OGP image. The web page may not be using OGP. please send again without the OGP image attached.
getSessionError: Login failed. Please check your entries.
imageCompressionError: An error occurred while compressing the image.
jwtDecodeError: An error occurred during JWT encoding.
jwtUpdateError:
Update your session.
Please re-login using the login form.
noJwtError: JWT is missing. Please log in again.
makeAvatarBlobRefError: An error occurred while processing avatar image.
noSessionError: No active session. Please log in again.
parseOgpError: An error occurred while parsing OGP. The web page may not be using OGP. please send again without the OGP image attached.
refreshJwtExpired: refreshJWT has expired. Please log in again.
refreshSessionError: An error occurred while refreshing the session. Please log in again.
resumeSessionError:
An error occurred while restoring the session.
The session may be expired. Please log in again.
